summary: The customer was frustrated with Contoso Wireless because they downgraded their service plan and were no longer receiving the streaming product that was promised. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and looked into the customer's account to determine why they were not receiving the streaming product. The agent offered a discounted rate on the streaming product for the duration of the customer's current service plan, so they could still enjoy the product at a discounted rate until their plan expires.
